articles.title: US arrests second pro-Palestinian Columbia University protester - BBC.com
articles.description: A Palestinian woman was arrested in New Jersey, while another activist from India chose to "self-deport", US officials say.
articles.content:
US immigration authorities have announced the arrest of a second activist who participated in pro-Palestinian protests last spring at Columbia University in New York City.
Leqaa Kordia, who is a Pal… [+3116 chars]
